p: Fever had the best performance in all weeks (aDOR 4.03; 95% CI 3.38–4.80) and in epidemic weeks (aDOR 2.78; 95% CI 2.21–3.50), and the best performance in both groups was in people aged ≥65 years. In contrast, a prospective study of children and adults in Canada during 2008–2011 found fever was discriminative for influenza infection in children, but not in adults [ 2].
